name: code_challenge_myob
description: This project is the code Challenge of Myob to do a payroll system. It is deployed on Heroku and avaliable on URL: [https://payrollsystemmyob.herokuapp.com](https://payrollsystemmyob.herokuapp.com)

scripts.client: cd client && npm install && npm start
scripts.server: cd server && npm install && npm start
scripts.dev: npm install && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
